text:
INSTRUMENTAL | INFRASTRUCTURE ENGINEER | Bay Area, CA (Palo Alto) | Full-time, Onsite | instrumental.com

As an infrastructure engineer at Instrumental you will own and scale a distributed linux compute fleet that delivers bleeding edge AI tools to factory floors all over the world, improving the quality of consumer electronics and other physical goods wherever they are made.

If this problem interests you, and you have background as a devops, linux sysadmin, or SRE then don't be shy and apply here!

https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/instrumentalai/view/...
